statements: SELECT * FROM crowdfunding_projects;
SELECT project_name, funding_goal FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE project_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM crowdfunding_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE funding_goal > 10000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE funding_goal > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT project_name, funding_goal FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE project_description LIKE '%technology%'
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE funding_goal < 2000 ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT * FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE project_name = 'Music Festival Project'
SELECT * FROM crowdfunding_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, backers_count FROM crowdfunding_projects JOIN project_details ON crowdfunding_projects.project_id = project_details.project_id;
SELECT project_name, goal_amount, pledged_amount FROM project_details JOIN crowdfunding_projects ON project_details.project_id = crowdfunding_projects.project_id;
SELECT project_name, success FROM crowdfunding_projects JOIN project_details ON crowdfunding_projects.project_id = project_details.project_id WHERE pledged_amount > goal_amount;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM crowdfunding_projects;
SELECT project_name, backers_count, goal_amount, pledged_amount FROM crowdfunding_projects JOIN project_details ON crowdfunding_projects.project_id = project_details.project_id;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description, success FROM crowdfunding_projects JOIN project_details ON crowdfunding_projects.project_id = project_details.project_id WHERE success = true;
SELECT project_name, backers_count, pledged_amount FROM crowdfunding_projects JOIN project_details ON crowdfunding_projects.project_id = project_details.project_id WHERE backers_count > 100;
SELECT project_name, goal_amount, success FROM crowdfunding_projects JOIN project_details ON crowdfunding_projects.project_id = project_details.project_id WHERE goal_amount <= pledged_amount;
SELECT * FROM crowdfunding_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE project_goal > 10000;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_goal FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM crowdfunding_projects ORDER BY project_goal DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE project_description LIKE '%exciting%';
SELECT * FROM crowdfunding_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_goal, end_date FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE project_goal > 1000;
SELECT backers.backer_name, backers.email, project_updates.update_text FROM backers JOIN project_updates ON backers.backer_id = project_updates.project_id;
SELECT * FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, project_goal, backers.backer_name FROM crowdfunding_projects LEFT JOIN backers ON crowdfunding_projects.project_id = backers.backer_id ORDER BY project_goal DESC;
SELECT * FROM crowdfunding_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, creator_name FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE funds_raised > funds_needed;
SELECT project_name, creator_name, funds_raised FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE funds_raised >= 5000;
SELECT project_description FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT project_name, creator_name, funds_needed, funds_raised FROM crowdfunding_projects ORDER BY funds_raised DESC;
SELECT project_name, creator_name, funds_needed FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE funds_raised > 5000 ORDER BY funds_needed DESC;
SELECT backer_name, email, total_pledged FROM backers WHERE total_projects_backed > 5 ORDER BY total_pledged DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, creator_name, funds_needed, funds_raised FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE funds_raised < funds_needed;
SELECT project_name, creator_name, funds_needed FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'Tech%' OR project_name LIKE 'Science%' ORDER BY project_name;
SELECT project_id, project_name, creator_name, funds_needed, funds_raised FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM project_updates WHERE update_date = '2022-10-15');
SELECT * FROM crowdfunding_projects;
SELECT project_name, project_owner, funding_goal FROM crowdfunding_projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_start_date FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE funding_goal > 1000;
SELECT backer_name, backer_email, backer_contribution FROM backers;
SELECT category_name FROM categories;
SELECT project_name, project_owner, funding_goal FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE project_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT project_name, project_description, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM crowdfunding_projects WHERE funding_goal > 10000 ORDER BY project_start_date DESC

SELECT project_name, project_owner, backer_name, backer_contribution FROM crowdfunding_projects JOIN project_backers ON crowdfunding_projects.project_id = project_backers.project_id JOIN backers ON project_backers.backer_id = backers.backer_id

SELECT project_name, category_name FROM crowdfunding_projects JOIN project_categories ON crowdfunding_projects.project_id = project_categories.project_id JOIN categories ON project_categories.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE category_name = 'Technology'

SELECT project_name, COUNT(backer_id) AS total_backers FROM crowdfunding_projects JOIN project_backers ON crowdfunding_projects.project_id = project_backers.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_backers > 5
